=== Introduction ===

In order to both publicize NGOs using Ubuntu and identify best practices, the Ubuntu NGO Team is collecting a series of case studies.

<nowiki>[[NGO-CaseStudy-Template | The Case Study Template]]</nowiki> is a starting point for creating case studies and interviews with NGOs using Ubuntu.
